amendment.description: An amendment to add a section stating "If Department of Veterans Affairs casework is brokered out to another office of the Department from its original submission site, a caseworker in a congressional office may contact the brokered office to receive an update on the constituent's case, and that office of the Department is required to update the congressional staffer regardless of their thoughts on jurisdiction".

action.text: By unanimous consent, the LaMalfa amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
